attributes.action: Give the people of England their democratic right to vote on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ireland have had their say, and so should we.
This is not about Britain pulling out of the EU. This is a petition demanding that, as a democratic nation, the people of England should be given the opportunity to vote to accept or reject the Lisbon Treaty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
